author: slava77
body:
technical PR to address https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45117#discussion_r1749241199

The only place where uint4 was used was in the (pixel track) pLS hit indexing.

I expect almost no change in technical performance (confirmed by internal LST CI timing tests).

This update also opens a bit more clearly a possibility to handle longer pixel tracks in full in the future.
title: LST replace uint4 by uint[4] array Params_pLS::ArrayUxHits
